meanings.definition: Fail to fulfill a promise or obligation.
meanings.sent1: He reneged on his promise to help with the project.
meanings.sent2: She reneged on her agreement to meet for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The cat reneged on its duty to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun reneged on its pledge to shine all day.
meanings.sent5: The student reneged on studying for the test, and failed as a result.

meanings.definition: Go back on a promise or commitment.
meanings.sent1: They reneged on their plan to go camping this weekend.
meanings.sent2: He reneged on his promise to take out the trash.
meanings.sent3: The dog reneged on its decision to stay in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The weather reneged on the forecasted sunny day.
meanings.sent5: She reneged on her commitment to attend the event, disappointing her friends.
